name: CLGeocoder
desc: An interface for converting between geographic coordinates and place names.

items.name: reverseGeocodeLocation
items.desc: Submits a reverse-geocoding request for the specified location and locale.

items.name: reverseGeocodeLocation
items.desc: Submits a reverse-geocoding request for the specified location.

items.name: geocodeAddressString
items.desc: Submits a forward-geocoding requesting using the specified address string and locale information.

items.name: geocodeAddressString
items.desc: Submits a forward-geocoding request using the specified string.

items.name: geocodeAddressString
items.desc: Submits a forward-geocoding request using the specified string and region information.

items.name: geocodePostalAddress
items.desc: Submits a forward-geocoding requesting using the specified Contacts framework information.

items.name: geocodePostalAddress
items.desc: Submits a forward-geocoding requesting using the specified locale and Contacts framework information.

items.name: geocodeAddressDictionary
items.desc: Submits a forward-geocoding request using the specified address dictionary.

items.name: isGeocoding
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the receiver is in the middle of geocoding its value.
